Review.Titre: Terms Feed was able to have the legal terms I needed ASAP
Review.Contenu: Terms Feed was able to have the legal terminology that I needed on a site ASAP, allowing me to move forward. I couldn’t really respect the fact that the must important terms that are state mandated, was the ones you needed to purchase, at a steep price. Personally I would have liked it all to be in one, an allowed me to pay for it all. But the site was a great and much needed service.

Review.Titre: Very good tools that are easy to use.

Review.Contenu: I purchased T+C and Privacy Policy. The transaction was pretty easy. The breakdown of pricing per option chosen was helpful in knowing the price before check out. The resulting document is not quite suited for my service based healing business... so I will need to edit out bits that don't apply and make some other changes. Checking out and payment was not straightforward. The payment page only had a field for credit card number & expiration - no field for the 3 digit security code or address so my payment was rejected several times. I followed the trouble shooting directions for Google settings etc but it still didn't work. I finally went through PayPal, which I hate using because of extra fees & just ethical issues with them as a payment platform. So a better set up for your payment platform would have made that all easier & less time consuming. Also, there didn't seem to be a way to streamline purchasing 2 documents in one transaction... I had to create separate purchases in order to get all I needed.

The basic plan should be updated to comply with current legal case law. The premium plan should be one price membership vs. a cost for each product. You are near or have now exceeded what a membership plan costs annually.

i used TermsFeed to obtain a privacy statement for our non-profit organization.  the process was quick and straightforward in completing the online form’s set of simple questions.  i only had to tweak the resulting privacy statement a bit to change the commercial term“Company” to the more suitable non-profit term of “Society”.
Product is fine, the constant harassment for a survey review is a bit much.

The process was super simple and easy - even for cabinet installer like me. They stand behind what they say and we plan to come back again once our terms need to be amended.

Review.Titre: Very thorough and easy to use
Review.Contenu: Very thorough and easy to use. Just what I needed for my site.

Review.Titre: Nice thorough template but missing customization
Review.Contenu: The process is very easy to go through. Unfortunately Google Play has added a requirement to cite "photos and videos" if an app collects them, and that choice isn't in the Termsfeed prompts, so we had to create the policy and then change it instead of leaving it hosted by Termsfeed. Still, a really good service and worth the money.

I was just trying to meet the new Google AdSense requirements for General Data Protection Regulation(GDPR) and I needed a privacy policy that met all the new requirements. Your site was recommended so I used it. It was fairly easy to use and seemed comprehensive.
We have been using TermsFeed services for years. This was the first time we needed support. The support was exceptional! Highly recommend!

Easy, affordable, and comprehensive. I needed online terms and conditions that covered major areas of liability, and I did not even know where to start. In less than 5 minutes, I was able to satisfy the requirements I needed and could customize it easily for my company. As a small business owner, this was a Godsend! Thank you.

The best in the world!! I had a problem with a payment, no cc transaction possible, so I asked data for a wire transfer payment!! They activated immediately my request and I had it free of charge. A real great behaviour!! Never found on the net. I'll be always proud of them!! Claudio Giannesi

Review.Titre: Very fast, very straightforward and priced right.
Review.Contenu: I used TermsFeed "Terms of Service" template and had exactly what I wanted in about 8 minutes.  I hit a bug on their website and left them feedback and support's response was within 30 minutes and *very* helpful.  Highly recommend this service - will likely be using their other products as a result of this experience.

Review.Titre: It was very easy to use
Review.Contenu: It was very easy to use. The privacy policy generator helped us to gain more information about what our website need. The content is rich and comprehensive. We also loved that the software sends notifications to update the privacy policy in case of changes in the parent law or regulation.

Great! Excellent! So easy to use and explains well with each step, while including specific needs. Couldn't be better really...I meam $20-60 is nothing compared to lawyer feesThank you term feed for making my site protected!

Review.Contenu: I needed to make some updates to my disclaimer policies. TermsFeed was exactly what I needed. By answering a few quick questions, I was able to easily customize my policies and get them up on my website in no time.

His professionalism and expertise were evident throughout our interactions, and he made the entire process seamless and efficient. I wholeheartedly urge anyone in need of a trustworthy and excellent Terms and Conditions agreement to use TermsFeed's services.
